name: Alec Bradley - Puck - Toro
additionalNotes: Puck is a box-pressed beauty with a Cuban-Sandwich style filler, that blows all other value brands out of the water. The Habano leaves used in Puck’s filler are the very same leaves utilized in some of the brand’s higher-priced lines, and are gracefully covered by a dark & oily Honduran Habano wrapper. Hand ‘em out to your friends and they’ll think you paid twice as much when they get a taste of the rich notes of espresso, pepper, and cocoa. Truly another winning blend from Alan Rubin.
